r.d: This is the Oracle OCI8 MDB2 driver.
r.n: - increased php dependency to 4.3.0 due to the usage of the streams API since beta5 - fixed typo in _getTextDeclaration() - fixed major issues in _execute() - fixed typo in _getTimestampDeclaration() - fixed typo in _getTimeDeclaration() - fixed listDatabases()
